sourcesContent: import{useRef as E,useEffect as m}from"react";import{useIsoMorphicEffect as T}from"./use-iso-morphic-effect.js";import{getOwnerDocument as N}from"../utils/owner.js";function F({container:e,accept:t,walk:r,enabled:c=!0}){let o=E(t),l=E(r);m(()=>{o.current=t,l.current=r},[t,r]),T(()=>{if(!e||!c)return;let n=N(e);if(!n)return;let f=o.current,p=l.current,d=Object.assign(i=>f(i),{acceptNode:f}),u=n.createTreeWalker(e,NodeFilter.SHOW_ELEMENT,d,!1);for(;u.nextNode();)p(u.currentNode)},[e,c,o,l])}export{F as useTreeWalker};
